definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
Supreme Court of the United States
pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Zui4 gao1 Fa3 yuan4

sentences.english: The Supreme Court did not hand down a sentence, but ordered the Appeals Court to re-examine the case.
sentences.chinese: 但最高法院没有宣布判决，而是责令上诉庭复议此案。

sentences.english: The plaintiff battled the decision all the way to the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 原告不服这项判决，上诉直到最高法院。

sentences.english: The members of our highest court are granted life tenure.
sentences.chinese: 我们最高法院的成员都是终生任期的。

sentences.english: A Latina on the Supreme Court's great.
sentences.chinese: 在最高法院有拉丁裔确实很强大。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court automatically reviews life imprisonment and death sentences.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院自动审查无期徒刑和死刑。

sentences.english: The case was up for the final decision in the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 该案由最高法院作最后判决。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court should give the women of Wal-Mart a chance to make their case together.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院应该给予沃尔玛的女员工们集体诉讼的机会。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court is expected to  affirm the  original judgment.
sentences.chinese: 预计最高法院将维持原判。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court has held that a new president cannot arbitrarily revoke final regulations that already have the force of law.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院坚持新总统不能武断废除已经生效的法律。

sentences.english: The door slams closed in his face and the Supreme Court isn't hearing any appeals.
sentences.chinese: 大门在他的面前砰然关上，而最高法院又不接受上诉。

sentences.english: Then she could take her seat on the Supreme Court when it meets in October.
sentences.chinese: 这样在最高法院十月与会时，埃琳娜可以顺利就任。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court rendered a unanimous verdict for the government in 1905.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院于1905年一致作出有利于政府的裁决。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court has ruled that laws criminalizing homosexual conduct are unconstitutional.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院裁定同性恋行为定罪的法律是违宪的。

sentences.english: The decision of the Supreme Court shall not be appealed against.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院的这一判决为终审判决。

sentences.english: I concluded that Judge Bork should not go on the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 我得出结论，博克法官不适合在最高法院任职。

sentences.english: The Sanhedrin was the high court of the Jews.
sentences.chinese: 公会是犹太社会里的最高法院。

definition: Supreme Court of the United States
pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Zui4 gao1 Fa3 yuan4

definition: Ministry of Justice (PRC etc)/Justice Department (USA etc)

pinyin: Zui4 gao1 Ren2 min2 Fa3 yuan4

definition: judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
grand justice/high court justice/supreme court justice
